field.label: Server Address
field.help: IP address or hostname of the Xray server (e.g. 1.2.3.4 or example.com)

field.label: UUID
field.help: User UUID from the server configuration

field.label: Flow
field.help: XTLS flow control. Use xtls-rprx-vision for VLESS+Reality.

field.label: Server Name (SNI)
field.help: SNI used for Reality handshake (e.g. www.cloudflare.com)

field.label: Fingerprint
field.help: TLS client fingerprint to mimic (chrome, firefox, safari, edge, random)

field.label: SOCKS5 Port
field.help: Local SOCKS5 port that xray-core listens on and tun2socks connects to (default: 10808)

field.label: TUN Interface
field.help: TUN device name created by tun2socks (default: proxytun2socks0). Must match Interfaces â†’ Assignments.

field.label: MTU
field.help: MTU for the TUN interface (default: 1500). Reduce to 1380 if large packets fail.

field.label: Xray Log Level
field.help: Verbosity of xray-core logs (warning recommended for production)
